property.name: lcm_application_name
property.description: If the application name property is longer than that only the first 12 symbols are taken. The LCM id consists three components: - application name which is defined by the user bellow; - unix timestamp; - random alphanum. The length of the whole LCM id must be 32. LCM Id is used in the communication between LCMs when it is public.
